@TuurDemeester actually we can calculate a weight for a 220GJ bitcoin, as its energy used, via E=mc^2 and then we get 1BTC weighs 2.4mg. so 2.4mg of antimatter = 1BTC at 220GJ/BTC, since antimatter has 100% mass/energy conversion.
